function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus transmission within physical spaces via air-based diffusion and circulation","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory virus spread within the built environment","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air filtration, and promoting mask-wearing","Technologies":"Air purification systems, HEPA filters, and ventilation monitoring devices","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Virus transmission via touching interactions with surfaces","Impact":"Potential for surface-based transmission of respiratory viruses","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of high-touch surfaces, promoting hand hygiene, and reducing surface contact","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, antimicrobial surface coatings, and touchless technology","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Simulation of specific scenarios within confined spaces to evaluate transmission risk","Impact":"Insufficient understanding and preparedness for managing transmission risk in confined spaces","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough risk assessments, implementing spatial reconfigurations, and establishing infection control protocols","Technologies":"Simulation software, spatial mapping tools, and contact tracing technology","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
